title: The TC XML
description: The TC XML API solution enables 3rd party developers to utilize exisiting TC products and deliver them in their own presentation. Our solution significantly improves support for 3rd party devlopers by: Automating frequent or time consuming tasks to increase productivity and quality, Adding client specific custom features, Allowing for "Branding" of the display with custom graphics, Allowing for "Branding" email communication sent to customers
